mapper.select: SELECT h.*, m.first_name, m.last_name FROM host h, member m WHERE h.id = #{id} AND (m.id = h.member_id)
SELECT * FROM host_photo WHERE host_id = #{hostId} ORDER BY id
SELECT blocking_date FROM blocking WHERE host_id = #{hostId} ORDER BY id

SELECT DISTINCT h.*, m.first_name, m.last_name FROM host h FULL OUTER JOIN blocking b ON(h.id = b.host_id), member m WHERE (NOT b.blocking_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sStartDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{sEndDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') OR b.blocking_date IS NULL) AND (h.latitude BETWEEN #{swLatitude} AND #{neLatitude}) AND (h.longitude BETWEEN #{swLongitude} AND #{neLongitude}) AND h.capacity >= #{capacity} AND (m.id = h.member_id) ORDER BY h.id
